question: Which form of breast cancer has Keytruda been FDA approved for?
ideal_answer: Keytruda has been FDA approved for use in combination with chemotherapy for treating PD-L1-positive mTNBC.

snippets.text: The combination of chemotherapy and immunotherapy is a potential therapeutic option for PD-L1-positive mTNBC, as the FDA recently approved atezolizumab (Tecentriq) and pembrolizumab (Keytruda) in combination with chemotherapy.
